start.title: The Protest has Begun. {first_move_actor} Will Make Their Move.
start.description: {first_move_actor} will make the first move. {second_move_actor} await their choice.

start.title: The Protest is Underway. {first_move_actor} are Making Their Move.
start.description: {first_move_actor} will make the first move. {second_move_actor} await their choice.

round_results.title: {round_winner} Win the {round_text} Round, Gaining {round_winner_points} Points. {round_loser} Gain {round_loser_points} Points.
round_results.description: In round {round_int}, the {round_winner} were {round_winner_reaction}, while the {round_loser} were {round_loser_reaction}. {round_score_standing_text}.

round_results.title: {round_winner} Have Won Round {round_int}, {round_score_standing_text}.
round_results.description: {round_winner} Reaction is {round_winner_reaction} In Round {round_int}, {actor_move_next} Move Next.

round_results.title: Victory for {round_winner} in Round {round_int}.
round_results.description: The {round_winner} reaction was {round_winner_reaction}, and the {round_loser} were {round_loser_reaction}. {round_score_standing_text}.

actor_response.title: {a_move} were {reaction}. {actor_move_next} move next.
actor_response.description: In round {round_int}, {a_move} were {reaction}. Now, {actor_move_next} make their move
